ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectSingle-Use Plastics Prohibition Regulations
PrecisSINGLE-USE PLASTIC PROHIBITION REGULATIONS in order to prohibit the manufacture, import, and sale (including for the purpose export), of six categories of single-use plastic manufactured items, with certain exemptions for single-use plastic flexible straws to accommodate persons with disabilities.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0138 Publication Date: 2022-06-22
